question: In which nation "Comoe National Park" is located?
explanation: Comoe National Park is located in Cote d'Ivoire. It is a Biosphere Reserve and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is the largest protected area in West Africa. This national park houses vegetations from humid Guinea Savanna to dry Sudanian Zone. It forms part of the Comoe River Basin. It was also added in the List of World Heritage Sites in Danger. It hosts the "Comoe Chimpanzee Conservation Project".
